translations: adj.顽皮的，放肆的（尤指女孩）

sentences.sentence: Miss Li is considered tomboyish and fair in appearance; she beat out many other well-known actors and actress.
sentences.translation: 李小姐被认为是野丫头和表现好；她击败了许多其它的知名的男演员和女演员。

sentences.sentence: Shop Stars' Hottest Shoes! From tomboyish loafers to sky-high boots, check out the styles your favorite celebrities will be wearing this autumn and winter.
sentences.translation: 买明星们最热门的鞋款！从调皮的乐福鞋到极高的靴子，来看看今年秋冬你最爱的明星们会穿什么样的款式。
